state.unicode: Set around Napoleon's youth, the campaign tutorial will teach the player the basics of the campaign game whilst developing Napoleon's character via the narration of one of his most trusted advisors Bertier. Starting in Corsica the player will learns the basics of Total Wars campaign game and then board Napoleon onto a ship for the French mainland. As the player progresses through France, Napoleon will be receive various traits and achievements to further develop the idea of character progression. These traits/achievements will be awarded when the player successfully completes one of the many missions in the tutorial which are based on key events in Napoleon's early life. With each mission completed, additional regions of France will become unlocked and made available from behind the shroud, culminating in the Siege of Toulon where the player will play the battle tutorial and finish the tutorial campaign.

uientry.unicode: If this box is checked you will occasionally get the option to join other player's battles. || When entering a battle, players can choose to play it as a drop-in battle. || If this option is chosen, the game will search for current online players to drop-in and take on the AI role. || Once the battle is over, the player who dropped-in will be returned to their campaign, the progress of which is saved whilst they are away.

uientry.s:
local current_selected = nil
function InitState() for n=1, Component.Call("ChildCount") do Component.Call("Children["..(n-1).."].LuaCall", "SetState", "normal") end if Component.GetProperty("Allow None Selected") == 0 then Component.Call("Children[0].LuaCall", "SetState", "selected") current_selected = 1 end end
function Notify(value, msg, address) print(msg) if value == Component.Messages.StateChange then if msg == "down" and Component.GetProperty("Single Selection") == 1 then for n=1, Component.Call("ChildCount") do if address ~= Component.Call("Children["..(n-1).."].Address") then Component.Call("Children["..(n-1).."].LuaCall", "SetState", "normal") else current_selected = n end end elseif msg == "selected_down" then if Component.GetProperty("Allow None Selected") == 0 then for n=1,Component.Call("ChildCount") do if address == Component.Call("Children["..(n-1).."].Address") then Component.Call("Children["..(n-1).."].LuaCall", "SetState", "selected") end end else current_selected = nil end end end end
function GetSelectedIndex() return current_selected end

function OnSelect() local this = UIComponent(Address) if this:CurrentState() ~= "inactive" then local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("sp_episodic_campaign")) panel:LuaCall("SelectCampaign", 3) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Notify", Component.Messages.StateChange, Component.Call("CurrentState"), Address) end end
function SetState(state) Component.SetState(state) end

state.unicode: You must complete the Italian campaign first to unlock this.

uientry.s:
function OnSelect() local this = UIComponent(Address) if this:CurrentState() ~= "inactive" then local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("sp_episodic_campaign")) panel:LuaCall("SelectCampaign", 4) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Notify", Component.Messages.StateChange, Component.Call("CurrentState"), Address) end end
function SetState(state) Component.SetState(state) end

state.unicode: You must complete the Egyptian campaign first to unlock this.

uientry.s:
function OnSelect() local this = UIComponent(Address) if this:CurrentState() ~= "inactive" then local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("sp_episodic_campaign")) panel:LuaCall("SelectWaterlooBattle") Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Notify", Component.Messages.StateChange, Component.Call("CurrentState"), Address) end end
function SetState(state) Component.SetState(state) end

state.unicode: You must complete the European campaign first to unlock this battle.

uientry.s:
dofile "data/ui/templates/template.fe_button_standard.lua"
local this = UIComponent(Address) function OnSelect() UIComponent(this:Parent()):LuaCall("StartCampaign") end
